P

play(PlayerContext) - Method in class controller.CPUPlayer
takes a reference to the context object that called it and sets the internal context var equal to this.
play(PlayerContext) - Method in class controller.HumanPlayer
takes a reference to the context object that called it and sets the internal context var equal equal to this.
play(PlayerContext) - Method in interface controller.Player
Play the game
play(PlayerContext) - Method in class controller.PlayerContext
As this object IS a player it needs a play() method, this method calls the play method in whichever concrete subclass of player is currently the active player.
play(Move) - Method in class model.Board
sets a cell of the board to the value of the token carried by the move
Player - Interface in controller
this interface defines a prototype for any 'Player', as we all know, players play games, and so do ours.
player - Static variable in class controller.PlayerContext
The active player
player1 - Static variable in class controller.PlayerContext
player 1,the human player
player2 - Static variable in class controller.PlayerContext
player 2, the AI player
PlayerContext - Class in controller
This class together with other concrete subclasses of 'Player' make up the "controller" of the tic tac toe game.

This is the context class in a "state pattern" arrangement based on the GOF design patterns book.
PlayerContext(GameWindow, CellButton) - Constructor for class controller.PlayerContext
constructor takes a reference to the view to update (GameWindow) and a reference to the button that is creating it.
playerList - Variable in class view.MenuChosePlayer
list of options
playerToken - Variable in class model.Move
token from the player making the move
